name: x-reply-extension
description: Chrome extension for AI-powered replies on X (Twitter)

scripts.build:dev: tsc --sourceMap && npm run copy-files && npm run manifest:dev
scripts.build:prod: tsc && npm run copy-files && npm run manifest:prod && npm run minify-dist
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run open-chrome && npm run watch
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.release: npm run prod && powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force release; Compress-Archive -Path .\dist\* -DestinationPath .\release\X-Reply-AI.zip -Force"
scripts.copy-files: cpy manifest.json dist/ && cpy "archive_root_duplicates/*.{html,js,css}" dist/ && cpy "archive_root_duplicates/icons/**" dist/icons/ && cpy "archive_root_duplicates/images/**" dist/images/
